title: You Think It’s Fine to Just Summon Me to Another World? Huh? - Novel Updates
tags: Antihero Protagonist   Apathetic Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Manipulative Characters   R-15   Sharp-tongued Characters   Stubborn Protagonist   Summoned Hero   Transported to Another World
author: Sekimura Imuya
description:
I, Kaya Minafuchi, a Japanese high school girl, was summoned to another world by its god, in order to protect it. Their god had summoned me to defend this world, and to the people that summoned me, my reply was of course:

“I don’t care about that. It’s your world, so do something about it yourselves.”>
